title: Futbol Americas: MLS continues dominance over Liga MX
description:
On Wednesday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez, Sebastian Salazar and Ben Olsen live form Minnesota, react to MLS' win over Liga MX in the All-Star Game. Then the guys discuss a pair of moves made by MLS clubs in the form of Christian Benteke to D.C. United and Sebastian Lletget to FC Dallas. Then Herc talks to TikTok star Noah Beck about participating in the All-Star Game festivities. Next, Orange County SC President Dan Rutstein joins the show to discuss the controversy surrounding LA Galaxy's exclusive arrangement proposal of Championship Soccer Stadium. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: MLS defeat Liga MX in MLS All-Star Game for second consecutive year
